t.t-if: (closed not in task.stage_id) and (usr in task.user_id)

div.p:
Did you know Help Scout can also keep track of voicemails and phone calls? Check out the Voicemail App for a list of supported voicemail providers.
You can log a new phone call by creating a new conversation and selecting the phone icon as the type. Anything you log as a phone call is added as a note to the conversation.

Did you know Help Scout can also keep track of voicemails and phone calls? Check out the Voicemail App for a list of supported voicemail providers.
You can log a new phone call by creating a new conversation and selecting the phone icon as the type. Anything you log as a phone call is added as a note to the conversation.

div.label: Receipts will be sent this email address
Image will be re-sized to 200x200 JPG,GIF,PNG
Users are allowed to delete notes/conversations
Users are allowed to edit notes/threads
Users are allowed to edit/delete saved replies
Users are allowed to manage tags
Users are allowed to manage workflows

div.p: Auto replies don't include your mailbox signature, so be sure to add your contact information if necessary.

div.div:
Content Nov 28
Tip: Working with Variables Variables are placeholders for generated customer, user, mailbox, and conversation data. For example, you could use a customer variable to automatically fill-in customer names in a saved reply. Learn more here.
